'''Alcarin''' ([[Quenya|Q]]: "(glorious"<ref>{{RGEO|Notes}}, note 3, p. 65</ref> or "the Glorious", pron. {{IPA|[Ëˆalkarin]}})<ref>{{PE|17}}, entry S '''aglar''', p. 24</ref> was an epithet of [[Atanatar II]], who ruled [[Gondor]]<ref name=Atanatar>{{App|South}}, p. 1043</ref> from {{TA|1149|}} until {{TA|1226}},<ref>{{App|South}}, entries Hyarmendacil I and Atanatar II, p. 1038</ref> in a time when its wealth and power were legendary<ref name=Atanatar/>.
